subject: Frauds and Swindling
Suits and Litigation
E-Commerce
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Shortly after 1-800-Flowers.com was sued for defrauding customers, its founder and chief executive, James F. McCann, was selected by the Mets as a minority owner.
snippet: Shortly after 1-800-Flowers.com was sued for defrauding customers, its founder and chief executive, James F. McCann, was selected by the Mets as a minority owner.
